channel.title: Someone plz anwser these questions an my 508 will be up (Experience HELP needed)
channel.description:
Thank you for your help but i really need an awnser because this is all im missing before i put server online
1. Could anyone tell me or show me a tut on how to change the experience ratings in a 508
2. Could anyone tell me how to make npc that sell items and also to change what they are selling thank you.
3. how could i put myself admin i already did login.java changed the name but still dosint work i hope someone could help
P.s have a good boxing day

Your rights should be 2 in the Login class…not 3.
